original_title: The Otter Side of the Lens
overview: The Isle of Mull is one of the UK's largest islands, located in the Inner Hebrides, and is home to one of the largest Eurasian otter populations in Europe. This documentary delves into the intricate relationship shared between this fascinating species and humans - through several sequences, each offering a different perspective.
tagline: A deep dive into the lives of otters around the Isle of Mull
title: The Otter Side of the Lens
